value.title: Google Ethical AI Group’s Turmoil Began Long Before Public Unraveling
value.excerpt: The ouster of lead researchers Gebru, Mitchell followed years of friction over how Google handled allegations of harassment and bias

value.title: Britain's driverless car ambitions hit speed bump with insurers
value.excerpt: Britain's goal to be a leader in adopting self-driving cars could backfire unless automakers and government regulators spell out the current limitations of the technology, insurance companies warn.

value.title: Europe proposes strict regulation of artificial intelligence.
value.excerpt: The rules have far-reaching implications for tech firms like Amazon, Google, Facebook and Microsoft, which have poured resources into developing the technology.

value.title: Everything Elon Musk Has Said About Tesla's Self-Driving Cars
value.excerpt: Elon Musk has had a lot to say about Tesla's Autopilot feature, which may have been connected to two deaths in an accident on Saturday in Texas.

value.title: Volvo will provide cars for Didi’s autonomous vehicle division
value.excerpt: Volvo will provide vehicles for Didi Chuxing’s self-driving taxi fleet, according to a new deal between the two companies. The Swedish automaker, which is owned by China’s largest private automaker Geely,

value.title: Shanghai Auto Show: Chinese internet search giant Baidu to supply its Apollo self-driving system to 1 million cars in 3-5 years
value.excerpt: Baidu expects to supply its Apollo autonomous driving system to 1 million cars in the next three to five years.

value.title: GAC Motors to launch its first self driving car with Huawei after 2024
value.excerpt: China’s GAC Motors is apparently planning on launching its first car model that supports self driving technology after 2024. The company is partnering with Huawei Technologies for its autonomous driving technology.

value.title: What Waymo’s new leadership means for its self-driving cars
value.excerpt: The change in leadership hints at the broader state of the self-driving car industry, which has failed to live up to its hype in the past few years.

value.title: Better Buy: Baidu vs. Alibaba

value.title: Here’s why AI will be crucial for future US electrical grid reliability
value.excerpt: But what if the biggest predictor of the success of the infrastructure plan is not in the materials but in artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning (ML)? Electrek spoke with Monte Zweben ...

value.title: Ocado to invest £10m in driverless vehicle start-up Oxbotica
value.excerpt: The first prototypes for driverless vehicles are expected be ready in two years, although they will likely be first used in its warehouses rather than in the street to make deliveries.

value.title: Driverless truck developer TuSimple debuts on Nasdaq
value.excerpt: The Chinese startup raised US$1.1 billion at a market capitalization of US$8.5 billion and ended the trading day unchanged.

value.title: Walmart is investing in self-driving development with Cruise
value.excerpt: GM-backed autonomous vehicle developer Cruise is having quite a week. Not only did it sign an agreement to be the sole self-driving vehicle partner with Dubai, it's now got Walmart as an investor, as confirmed on Thursday in an announcement by Walmart US CEO John Furner.

value.title: Self-Driving Truck Startup TuSimple Raises $1.35 Billion In Nasdaq IPO
value.excerpt: Self-driving truck startup TuSimple rang the opening bell on Wall Street Thursday (April 15) after raising $1.35 billion in an initial public offering (IPO).

value.title: Robot Truck Startup TuSimple Raises $1 Billion In First Self-Driving Startup IPO
value.excerpt: The San Diego-based developer of robotic truck technology is the first self-driving tech company to go public in the U.S.–and did so via a conventional IPO.

value.title: Autonomous trucking company Plus will use AI and billions of miles of data to train self-driving semis
value.excerpt: By this time next year, hundreds of automated trucks powered by PlusDrive will be on the road, hauling commercial cargo.

value.title: Cruise's head of artificial intelligence wants the autonomous-car startup to be defined by its AI innovation
value.excerpt: Hussein Mehanna thinks machine learning is going to set Cruise apart, and he told Insider how companies could become "AI natives" in the future.

value.title: Tesla next-gen ‘Full Self-Driving’ is delayed to May-June, subscription coming next month
value.excerpt: Tesla is currently testing the “feature complete” version of its Full Self-Driving (FSD) package in beta with a few thousand customers and employees through its early access program.

value.title: This robot-run fund with a history of predicting Tesla price moves has just made these stock picks
value.excerpt: An exchange-traded fund driven by artificial intelligence has correctly predicted Tesla price movements, and recently shared its most recent

value.title: Tesla’s Chinese rival Xpeng ups the self-driving game with world’s first mass-produced LiDAR in P5 sedan, defying Elon Musk
value.excerpt: Xpeng, Tesla’s Chinese rival, fuels the competition of autonomous driving to a new level with its newly-launched P5 sedan becoming the world’s first mass-produced vehicle with LiDAR technology.

value.title: Hyperdrive Daily: Self-Driving’s Trough of Disillusionment Continues

value.title: Huawei invests in self-driving and electric car tech it says surpasses Tesla
value.excerpt: The Chinese telecoms giant will partner with carmakers to make self-driving vehicles that carry the Huawei name as a sub-brand, says rotating chairman.

value.title: Routing Of Self-Driving Cars To Avoid The Bad Parts Of Town Raises Some Serious Eyebrows
value.excerpt: Self-driving cars are readily routed and could be programmed to avoid the bad parts of town, but this raises concerns from a societal viewpoint.

value.title: Houston, we have pizza: Domino’s and Nuro run self-driving delivery robots
value.excerpt: Pizza chain Domino's and self-driving robot develope Nuro are working together to deliver pizzas by, well, robot to select customers in Houston.

value.title: Self driving robot car will start delivering Domino's pizza in Houston
value.excerpt: Domino's Pizza will start delivering pizzas via Nuro driver-less cars as part of a pilot program, the company announced on April 12, 2021. The company says “select customers” in Houston who make a prepaid delivery order from its store in the Woodland Heights neighborhood during certain dates and times can have their pizza brought to them by a Nuro R2 robot.

value.title: Drone maker DJI the latest Chinese tech giant to get into the car game

value.title: Tesla's Semi makes first deliveries; Waymo, Uber expand driverless truck testing
value.excerpt: Tesla's electric Semi made its first delivery while Waymo and Uber each said they are expanding tests of driverless trucks. Tesla founder and CEO Elon Musk announced late last week the company ...

value.title: Cruise to be Dubai's exclusive self-driving taxi provider, report says
value.excerpt: Cruise is setting its sights abroad for the first time after years of testing its self-driving vehicle technology in the US. The GM-backed autonomous vehicle developer is looking to make Dubai the first city outside of the United States in which it will ...

value.title: Chinese autonomous vehicle startup WeRide scores permit to test driverless cars in San Jose
